mapper.select: SELECT product_no, product_condition, category_name, product_name, product_price, product_content FROM PRODUCTS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (product_name, product_condition, category_name, product_price, product_content) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productCondition}, #{categoryName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTS SET product_name = #{productName}, product_condition = #{productCondition}, category_name = #{categoryName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_content = #{productContent} WHERE product_no = #{productNo}
